anonymous.description: True if the user is anonymous - in this case the userID field will contain the user's IP as an attempt to uniquely identify them for session counting

userID.description: The Zooniverse User ID of the user performing the event, or if anonymous, the user's IP

nextSeq.description: The next available sequence number to be used for this user

currentSession.description: The session number, starting at 1, of the user's current session (new sessions start after 30 mins)

currentEventNumberWithinSession.description: The event number, starting at 1, of the last event within the user's session

timeOfLastEvent.description: The time (on the server) of the user's last event
